N

newWindow() - Method in class ooga.view.ViewManager
 
nextTurn() - Method in class ooga.model.components.GameBoard
This method increases the moveNumber, thereby simulating a CompletedAction
NoHeldPieceTurnCondition - Class in ooga.model.components.turnconditions
This class is used to determine if the turn is over for a specific game type, and is defined in the games .xml file This class is dependant on the TurnConditionResult enum.
NoHeldPieceTurnCondition() - Constructor for class ooga.model.components.turnconditions.NoHeldPieceTurnCondition
 
NoMoves - Class in ooga.model.components.winconditions
This class is used to determine if someone has won the current game, by checking if the opponent team ahs any possible moves This class assumes a defined FrontEndExternalAPI is passed in, as well as the current GameBoard This class depends upon FrontEndExternalAPI.java and GameBoard.java Code Example: //assumes GameBoard gameBoard and FrontEndExternalAPI frontEndExternalAPI have been previously defined EndGameCondition endGameCondition = new NoMoves(frontEndExternalAPI, gameBoard); gameBoard.movePiece(0,0); if(endGameCondition.checkForWin){ exit(0); } //continue the game
NoMoves(FrontEndExternalAPI, GameBoard) - Constructor for class ooga.model.components.winconditions.NoMoves
Initializer for the FourInARow EndGameCondition
normalChecker - Variable in class ooga.model.components.moveconditions.CheckerPromotion
 
noTurnRules - Variable in class ooga.model.engine.running.ClickExecutor
 
noTurnRules - Variable in class ooga.model.engine.running.GameEngine
 
numCols - Variable in class ooga.model.initialization.BoardCreator
 
NUMCOLS - Static variable in class ooga.model.initialization.BoardCreator
 
numRows - Variable in class ooga.model.initialization.BoardCreator
 
NUMROWS - Static variable in class ooga.model.initialization.BoardCreator
